#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <map>

#define FIB 210000
using namespace std;

int fib[FIB];
void precompute()
{
	fib[0] = 0, fib[1] = fib[2] = 1;
	for(int i = 3; i < FIB; i++)
		fib[i] = fib[i-1] + fib[i-2];
}
int main()
{
	memset(fib,0,sizeof(fib));
	precompute();
	map<int,int>mfib;
	for(int i = 0; i < FIB; i++)
		mfib[fib[i]] = 1;
	
	int T; cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		int N; cin >> N;
		
		if(mfib[N] == 1)
			cout << "Yes\n";
		else
			cout << "No\n";
	}
	
	return 0;
}//end main
